code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{API_URL}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function StudentForm(_ref){let{onAdd}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);try{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/students"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({name,email})});if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Failed to add student");const data=await res.json();onAdd(data);setName("");setEmail("");}catch(err){alert(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:loading,children:loading?"Adding...":"Add Student"})]});}export default StudentForm;
